name: Breakout Remake (Gyarmati Zsolt)
description:
Breakout Remake is a prototype game inspired by the old "Breakout" Atari game.

The goal of the game is to destroy every colored brick on the displayed with 5balls.

Every colored brick needs to be hit 1 time expect the red ones those need 2 hits.

This game is made in 6hours from scratch for a prototype portfolio.

Control : 

Player movement - A(left)  D(right)

Pause - Escape
